ComicInfo.Summary:
Twilight of Innocence: Lady Death recounts her origins as a young medieval girl whose power mad father tries to gain enough strength to challenge the lord of hell so he can become its ruler.
Decent into Hell: Lady Death continues to recount her origin. As the girl named Hope, she attempts to save herself from being burned at the stake by making a deal with hell. She is transported to hell herself and becomes caught in the middle of a battle between her father and Lucifer.
Death's Queen Rising: Lady Death finishes the telling of her origin as to how she defeated Lucifer in hell but was cursed to stay there until every human on earth was dead.
